# Jackson Converter

A Converter which uses Jackson (opens new window) for serialization to and from JSON.

A default ObjectMapper instance will be created or one can be configured and passed to the JacksonConverterFactory construction to further control the serialization.

# Download

Download the latest JAR (opens new window) or grab via Maven (opens new window):

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.squareup.retrofit2</groupId>
  <artifactId>converter-jackson</artifactId>
  <version>latest.version</version>
</dependency>
1
2
3
4
5

or Gradle (opens new window):

implementation 'com.squareup.retrofit2:converter-jackson:latest.version'
1

Snapshots of the development version are available in Sonatype's snapshots repository (opens new window).
